mapper.select: SELECT p.project_name AS name, ifnull(ps.cou, 0) AS value1 FROM ( SELECT bps.project_id AS projectId, COUNT(*) AS cou FROM t_bus_project_select bps GROUP BY bps.project_id ) ps RIGHT JOIN t_bus_project p ON p.id = ps.projectId

SELECT p.project_name AS projectName, ps.cou1 AS cou1, ps.cou2 AS cou2, ps.cou3 AS cou3, ps.cou4 AS cou4, ps.cou5 AS cou5 FROM ( SELECT bps.project_id AS projectId, COUNT(case when bps.score > 0 and bps.score <= 60 then 1 end) AS cou1, COUNT(case when score > 60 and score <= 70 then 1 end) AS cou2, COUNT(case when score > 70 and score <= 80 then 1 end) AS cou3, COUNT(case when score > 80 and score <= 90 then 1 end) AS cou4, COUNT(case when score > 90 and score <= 100 then 1 end) AS cou5 FROM t_bus_project_select bps GROUP BY bps.project_id ) ps RIGHT JOIN t_bus_project p ON p.id = ps.projectId
